title: Toddler Counting 123 Kids Free
creator: GiggleUp Kids Apps And Educational Games

extendedInfo.description: Learning to count is as easy as 1, 2, 3! Watch your toddler discover the simple joy of learning as they tap and count along. Designed for young minds and tiny fingers, the gameplay is simple and without fuss - filled with heaps of lighthearted fun and even more room to grow!NO FUSS Children donât need to sort through complicated menus. Jumps straight into the fun with just one tap! Parents can determine the pace of learning with the customizable options available via settings, including:- The smallest and largest number to play (1 to 20)- Count in order of smallest to largest, or by random- Choose from 10 categories of real life objectsA FUN EXPERIENCE  Count along and learn the names of all your favourite animals, toys, household objects and more! Learn in a fun environment complete with cool sound effects, clear and pleasant voice narration, as well as positive feedback to encourage and to help young players stay motivated. COUNT AROUND THE WORLDAll recorded by native speakers, you can now learn to count in 8 exciting languages. So count away! Includes: English, French, Spanish, Japanese, German, Swedish, Chinese Mandarin and Italian. Features:â Child-friendly interface with no complicated menusâ More than 130 objects to count along toâ 10 categories: animals, transport, shapes, household objects, musical instruments, toys, insects, food, ocean creatures and outdoor objectsâ Clear and pleasant voice guide spoken by native speakersâ Available in 8 languages: English, French, Spanish, Japanese, German, Swedish, Chinese Mandarin and Italianâ Fully adjustable game settings â Beautiful real life photographs of objectsâ Cheery background music track that can be easily switched on or offKeywords: Counting, Toddler, Preschool, Kids, Games, Count, 123, Game, Games

reviews.title: Toddler fun
reviews.comment: My daughter who is two loves this app. She enjoys the pictures and the counting. Awesome way to introduce your little one to counting.
reviews.author: Cindy Noriega

reviews.title: Very concerning
reviews.comment: I\'d like to know why when my toddler was playing this game and accidentally clicked on an ad it took her to a japanese porn site??? She is TWO and Im pretty concerned that a kids app so easily directed her to that and within a minute of starting the game?! Other than that its been a great game Lol
reviews.author: Ashley Reust

reviews.title: Licensed?
reviews.comment: Just like another said, I constantly get a pop up stating that this app is not licensed and to check my internet connection to verify whether licensed  when my internet connection is more than capable. I can\'t even go from one number to another without getting. This is extremely irritating. If not fixed in the very immediate future will be uninstalling. If this could be fixed I would love this app.
reviews.author: Russel Trahan

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works on phone but needs internet on tablet to work. Sick of 3 year old playing phone, got her a tablet now she cant pkay it. Very good educational app.
reviews.author: Prue Lilliebridge

reviews.title: Tot enjoys
reviews.comment: My 20mth old tot loves this appvfor learning her counting. She is able to verbally count to and point at an object from 1-10 already
reviews.author: Danielle Wilson

reviews.comment: Fails to provide an exit without restarting each time the app is opened... otherwise above average
reviews.author: Caryn Hunter-Muller

reviews.title: Exceptional teaching material.
reviews.comment: I have 7 grandchildren of varied ages, and they have all used, and loved, and learned from this app. The app lets the user see, hear, and count the number, then commends the user on their good work. It even mimics a sound to describe the item being counted. I\'m so grateful for such a valuable learning tool. I now use the paid version, however, because the advertising on the free app can sometimes be a distraction. THANK YOU, AND WELL DONE, TODDLER COUNTING 123 !!!!
reviews.author: Margaret Thomson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: My 18 month old enjoys it very much. The audio is good quality and the graphics are great. Nice appear for free. The only thing is that it freezes occassionaly.
reviews.author: Heather Schiefer

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work without network connection!
reviews.comment: Thanks for making this app useless in an area when you have no service, it says something about a licence check? Its a free version! I can see the reason the developer did this was so that you cannot \"go add free\" simply by putting the phone on airplane mode. This should be fixed.
reviews.author: Jason Johnson

reviews.title: Daughter loves it, but doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: My 22 month old daughter loves this app and it is the best I hzve found for her. A lot of other aps need you to hit the \"next button\", but not this one and she is able to play and count all by herself. Tech support, please fix whatever problem is going on. It works for awhile and the  I have to uninstill and reinstall it.
reviews.author: Stephanie Sanders

reviews.title: Best learning app
reviews.comment: My 2 yr old boy loves the bus. The counting is so simple for them. Great app! A keeper!
reviews.author: Lyndsay Privett

reviews.title: Game crashes
reviews.comment: Game crashes on 5 Beetles. Only lets user count 3 beetles. Cant exit out of game when crashes. Music continues to play after closing game.
reviews.author: Kristi Reed

reviews.title: Great simple app
reviews.comment: This is a great app for toddlers; simple and easy to use. My 2.5 year old loves counting along, I have no problems with ads, licence or freezing. Best part is that it\'s interactive; doesn\'t start counting on it\'s own, the child touches each item & therefore initiates and controls counting.
reviews.author: Narissa Markellos

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: my kid really like this game  .
reviews.author: Maftukha Binti Muslim

reviews.comment: My 2 year old daughter loves this game. It keeps her completely occupied. And she counted to 20 yesterday!
reviews.author: Mary Cobb

reviews.title: Good app for one year old
reviews.comment: My little guy likes this better than most apps so far.
reviews.author: Anna Littlefield

reviews.title: My 2yr old loves it!!
reviews.comment: It\'s fun and super easy to use for my little one.
reviews.author: Dory Flores

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very educational!!
reviews.author: Kelly Zuch

reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
reviews.comment: We love it in Grants Pass, OR. My daughter is two and it helps her count. It has no problem running on my LG Options G.
reviews.author: Steven Ackerman

reviews.title: Fun way to teach counting!
reviews.comment: My 3 year old daughter really likes this game. She asks to do her \"homework\" everyday!!
reviews.author: Wes Magee
